name: Adélie Run: ice melting danger
description:
Try to save as many Adélie Penguins as you can on this sidescrolling platform runner game. It's based on climate changes issue that may cause problems such as the ice melting and it does put some animals lives in danger.  This game was made to tha Climate Jam 2018.

Team
Antonin - Programmer
Caroldot - Artist/ Designer
ShidoStrife - Audio
